bibl.title: Miniature Codices from Kellis. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Two wooden mini-codices (apparently from a local school) found during Australian excavations at Ismant el-Kharab (ancient Kellis) in the Dakhleh Oasis, fourth century CE. - I. C.A.H., The Discovery. - II. K.A.W., A Parody of Homer, Arithmetical Exercises and a List of Greek Verbs: 1. Inv. D/2/46. A Parody of Homer; - 2. Inv. D/2/45. Five Fraction Tables; - 3. Inv. D/2/44. A List of Greek Verbs.
bibl.seg: HOPE Colin A. and K.A. WORP, Miniature Codices from Kellis. Avec résumé en anglais.

Two wooden mini-codices (apparently from a local school) found during Australian excavations at Ismant el-Kharab (ancient Kellis) in the Dakhleh Oasis, fourth century CE. - I. C.A.H., The Discovery. - II. K.A.W., A Parody of Homer, Arithmetical Exercises and a List of Greek Verbs: 1. Inv. D/2/46. A Parody of Homer; - 2. Inv. D/2/45. Five Fraction Tables; - 3. Inv. D/2/44. A List of Greek Verbs.
